meta.title: Our Impact | Pledge & Grow
meta.description: Learn about Pledge & Grow's commitment to social responsibility, sustainability, and making a positive impact through technology.

hero.title: Making a Positive Impact Through Technology
hero.description: At Pledge & Grow, we believe in the power of technology to create positive change. We're committed to leveraging our expertise to support causes that make the world a better place.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We're committed to using our skills, resources, and influence to support causes that align with our values. Through pro bono work, charitable initiatives, and sustainable practices, we strive to be a force for good in the communities we serve.
mission.quote: Technology should serve humanity, not the other way around.
mission.commitment: We're dedicated to developing solutions that empower people, protect our planet, and promote social justice.

sustainablePractices.title: Sustainable Practices
sustainablePractices.description: Our approach to sustainability encompasses everything from our development practices and infrastructure choices to our office operations and supply chain management. We continuously measure, report, and improve our environmental performance.
sustainablePractices.additionalText: Beyond our own operations, we actively seek opportunities to develop technology solutions that address environmental challenges and promote sustainable practices across industries.

practices.title: Carbon-Neutral Cloud
practices.description: We prioritize cloud providers with carbon-neutral operations and optimize our applications for energy efficiency.

practices.title: Circular IT Practices
practices.description: We extend device lifecycles, refurbish equipment, and ensure responsible recycling of electronic waste.

practices.title: Energy Efficiency
practices.description: Our development practices emphasize code optimization to reduce computational resources and energy consumption.

environmentalCommitment.title: Our Environmental Commitment
environmentalCommitment.mainText: We're committed to achieving carbon neutrality in our operations by 2026 and helping our clients reduce their environmental impact through thoughtful technology solutions.
environmentalCommitment.subText: Each year, we publish a sustainability report detailing our progress and setting new targets for improvement.

cta.title: Join Us in Making a Difference
cta.description: Whether you're a nonprofit organization in need of technology support, a company looking to partner on social impact initiatives, or an individual who wants to contribute, we'd love to hear from you.
